protein.specific_function: Involved in the assembly or repair of the [Fe-S] clusters present in iron-sulfur proteins. Binds iron

reference.reference_text: Tong WH, Rouault T: Distinct iron-sulfur cluster assembly complexes exist in the cytosol and mitochondria of human cells. EMBO J. 2000 Nov 1;19(21):5692-700.
